DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether MEDI4920 is safe and tolerable in patients with adult-onset rheumatoid arthritis.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1b Study of MEDI4920 in Subjects With Adult-onset Rheumatoid Arthritis
DOC.criteria: adultonset rheumatoid arthritis swollen and tender joints venous thromboembolism or arterial thrombosis pregnant or breastfeeding hepatitis B, C or HIV active or untreated latent tuberculosis
